childElements.name: Opioid_Instructions
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "This tool should be administered to patients upon an initial visit prior to beginning opioid therapy for pain management. A score of 3 or lower indicates low risk for future opioid abuse, a score of 4 to 7 indicates moderate risk for opioid abuse, and a score of 8 or higher indicates a high risk for opioid abuse.", "text" : "This tool should be administered to patients upon an initial visit prior to beginning opioid therapy for pain management.
